name: Post a new available pet to the store. Assert new pet added.

testSteps.description: Given User set valid endpoint to "POST_PUT_PET"

When User send the "Post" request with valid json having following details
| description | Key | Value |
| key to be updated | nameToBeUpdated | TestProject |
| key to be updated | statusToBeUpdated | Available |

restQuery.responseHeaders:
Date: Mon, 19 Oct 2020 10:14:27 GMT

Transfer-Encoding: chunked
Connection: keep-alive
Access-Control-Allow-Origin: *
Access-Control-Allow-Methods: GET, POST, DELETE, PUT
Access-Control-Allow-Headers: Content-Type, api_key, Authorization
Server: Jetty(9.2.9.v20150224)

testSteps.description: And pet id is generated in response
